Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It helped make me feel more comfortable getting feedback as it was more straight-foreword and had less discrepancies than the teacher.

Question 41.Response: It made me feel more comfortable and certain for where to go from there in regards to improving my work

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: When having multiple teachers for one subject there were lots of discrepencies for their feedback on the same project however the AI was precise and exact.
